moves.2. e5: I hate it when this happens; it's so annoying. >.<
moves.2... Ng8: Moving my knight out of harm's way
moves.3... d6: Get ready for the battle of the pawns.
moves.5... Nf6: Now I can take my knight out again.
moves.6. h3: Who knows what he's doing here? Not me, that's for sure.
moves.6... e6: Opening a path for my DSB.
moves.7. c3: Another pawn move, effectively cancelling anything I could do with my DSB.
moves.8. Qa4: Threatening my knight, eh? It won't be that easy, you know!
moves.9... Bxc6: And I respond; my bishop now threatens his queen and is protected by my b-pawn. I was surprised by what he did next.
moves.10. Bb5: He threatens my bishop with his own
moves.14. Na3: Not the best move; perhaps it would have been better to do Nd2.
moves.14... Nxe3: Taking his bishop in order to lessen the pawn defense around his king
moves.15... Qd7: I try a little ploy with my queen; at the very least, we can trade queens and I won't have to worry about his anymore. I didn't even realize that he could have made a crucial mistake here, which he did.
moves.16. Nc4: I have no idea what he's doing with that knight; perhaps he wants to bring it into our little struggle over here.
moves.16... c5: I move my pawn up one to open a path to his queen
moves.17. Ne5: This was a big mistake on his part; better to move pawn to b3 or else move the queen.
moves.17... Qxa4: Now he lost his queen without me having to sacrifice mine.
moves.18... Qe4: Aiming for the pawn on e3, but I failed to see what he would do with that pesky knight of his.
moves.19. Nxf7: He takes my pawn and my king can't respond
moves.19... Rf8: Moving my rook out of danger
moves.23. Kh1: I seriously don't know what this move was about.
moves.23... Qxe3: I take the pawn that I wanted a few turns ago.
moves.24. Rf1+: He tries to put my king in check.
moves.25... Rc8: Trying to take his other pawns
moves.26... Rc5: I decide to bring my rook into the action
moves.27. Rf3: Threatening both my queen and bishop at once
moves.27... Qe1+: And he resigned after this move.
